verbs.description: undeceive (third-person singular simple present undeceives, present participle undeceiving, simple past and past participle undeceived)

entries.meaning: (transitive) to free from misconception, deception or error
examples: […]  Marcasites, I say, being thus fitted to delude the unskilful, I have had much ado to undeceive some, that brought or sent me them from America, of the pleasing Confidence they had entertained, that these promising Fossiles were Lumps of rich Ore of Gold, or Silver.
